title: FS: T206 Cobb (bat on shoulder) Sovereign 150 PSA 5 **Deal Pending**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Cobb (bat on shoulder) Sovereign 150 PSA 5 **Deal Pending**
posts.post_content: Corners look like 7's, snow white borders, amazing card. Sovereign 150's are much tougher than Sovereign 350's. A recent PSA 8 of this card sold for over $40k! This card has all the eye appeal of a 7, $5500 delivered, thanks...

Kevin--You have some amazing cards, and this Cobb is one of them! Best wishes for the sale.

Cheers,
Mike
